verses.name: Genesis 38:1
verses.text: And it came to pass at that time, that Judah went down from his brethren, and turned in to a certain Adullamite, whose name was Hirah.

verses.name: Genesis 38:2
verses.text: And Judah saw there a daughter of a certain Canaanite, whose name was Shuah; and he took her, and went in unto her.

verses.name: Genesis 38:3
verses.text: And she conceived, and bare a son; and he called his name Er.

verses.name: Genesis 38:4
verses.text: And she conceived again, and bare a son; and she called his name Onan.

verses.name: Genesis 38:5
verses.text: And she yet again conceived, and bare a son; and called his name Shelah: and he was at Chezib, when she bare him.
